text: BOH ne zaboronyv domashnu khudobu shcho begets pevni kombinatsiyi muzhchyn ta zhinok, ne domashnoyi khudoby zvilʹnenoyi klyatvoyu, ne shcho begets dvoma muzhchynamy u ryadi, ne byku shcho batʹko desyatʹ. Tse yavlyaye soboyu disbelievers khto vynayshov taki brekhnyu pro BOHA. Bilʹshistʹ yikh ne rozumiyutʹ
